cards.name: Atarka, World Render
cards.text:
Flying, trample
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, it gains double strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Her hunger knows no limit. Left unchecked, she would feast on all of Tarkir."
-Yasova Dragonclaw

cards.name: Emmara, Soul of the Accord
cards.text: Whenever Emmara, Soul of the Accord becomes tapped, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.
cards.flavor: "Whatever hatred destroys, a single act of trust can revive."

cards.name: Gisa and Geralf
cards.text:
When Gisa and Geralf enters the battlefield, mill four cards.
During each of your turns, you may cast a Zombie creature spell from your graveyard.
cards.flavor: "These fiends are slightly less tolerable than you." "A sentiment that warms my heart, sister."

cards.name: Isperia, Supreme Judge
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: "I serve only justice. But through that duty, I serve all of Ravnica."

cards.name: Kardur, Doomscourge
cards.text:
When Kardur, Doomscourge enters the battlefield, until your next turn, creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.
Whenever an attacking creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Ajani, Caller of the Pride
cards.text:
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
[−3]: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.
[−8]: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens, where X is your life total.

cards.name: Archon of Redemption
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Archon of Redemption or another creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to that creature's power.
cards.flavor: Until Emeria is freed, he raises his sword in her name.

cards.name: Aven Gagglemaster
cards.text:
Flying
When Aven Gagglemaster enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature you control with flying.
cards.flavor: An aven's gear is enchanted to avoid weighing them down during aerial maneuvers.

cards.name: Banishing Light
cards.text: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
The Champion reached for a stone, and Heliod placed the sun into her hand.
-The Theriad

cards.name: Cartographer's Hawk
cards.text:
Flying
When Cartographer's Hawk deals combat damage to a player who controls more lands than you, return it to its owner's hand. If you do, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Citywide Bust
cards.text: Destroy all creatures with toughness 4 or greater.
cards.flavor:
"Oh, you fellas are going to love the lockup. Excellent gruel. Very low ceilings."
-Libuse, Boros sergeant

cards.name: Cleansing Nova
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
cards.flavor: In their final moments, the demons gazed upon grace in its purest form.

cards.name: Commander's Insignia
cards.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.
cards.flavor: At the general's triumphant return, renewed strength surged through the soldiers' ranks.

cards.name: Conclave Tribunal
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Conclave Tribunal enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Conclave Tribunal leaves the battlefield.

cards.name: Condemn
cards.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
cards.flavor:
"No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now."
-Alovnek, Boros guildmage

cards.name: Crush Contraband
cards.text:
Choose one or both -
• Exile target artifact.
• Exile target enchantment.
cards.flavor: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

cards.name: Dawn of Hope
cards.text:
Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.
cards.flavor:
"To wage war, secure peace within yourself."
-Emmara

cards.name: Devouring Light
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Exile target attacking or blocking creature.
cards.flavor: "Even your shadow is too foul to tolerate."

cards.name: Dictate of Heliod
cards.text:
Flash
Creatures you control get +2/+2.
cards.flavor: "Daxos, I'm in need of a champion. Who else would I turn to but you?"

cards.name: Disenchant
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: Where the holy light of the angels has shone, only purity remains.

cards.name: Emeria Angel
cards.text:
Flying
Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: When the earth shudders, the sky overflows.

cards.name: Felidar Retreat
cards.text:
Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one -
• Create a 2/2 white Cat Beast creature token.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.

cards.name: Generous Gift
cards.text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
cards.flavor: The best presents are impossible to regift.

cards.name: Gideon Jura
cards.text:
[+2]: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able.
[−2]: Destroy target tapped creature.
[0]: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

cards.name: Hanged Executioner
cards.text:
Flying
When Hanged Executioner enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
{3}{W}, Exile Hanged Executioner: Exile target creature.

cards.name: Hour of Reckoning
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy all nontoken creatures.
cards.flavor: Those who are chosen do not doubt. Those who remain do not lament.

cards.name: Kangee's Lieutenant
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Kangee's Lieutenant attacks, attacking creatures with flying get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Encore {5}{W} ({5}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Mentor of the Meek
cards.text: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "In these halls there is no pass or fail. Your true test comes with the first full moon."

cards.name: Path to Exile
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Rally of Wings
cards.text: Untap all creatures you control. Creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Even the clouds became a field of battle. Known as the Sky Theater, it saw the Eternals clash with squadrons of angels.

cards.name: Remorseful Cleric
cards.text:
Flying
Sacrifice Remorseful Cleric: Exile target player's graveyard.
cards.flavor: A lifetime of keeping up appearances is not enough to earn an eternity of rest.

cards.name: Rootborn Defenses
cards.text: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
cards.flavor: "No harm can come to me while the Worldsoul shelters me."

cards.name: Sephara, Sky's Blade
cards.text:
You may pay {W} and tap four untapped creatures you control with flying rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Flying, lifelink
Other creatures you control with flying have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

cards.name: Soul Snare
cards.text: {W}, Sacrifice Soul Snare: Exile target creature that's attacking you or a planeswalker you control.
cards.flavor:
"Shackle the body, and the anguish lasts only until death. Shackle the soul, and the wicked can be punished for eternity."
-Inquisitor Laerin

cards.name: Steel-Plume Marshal
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Steel-Plume Marshal attacks, other attacking creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The defenders watched in terror as the flying V split apart into a bristling battle formation.

cards.name: Storm Herd
cards.text: Create X 1/1 white Pegasus creature tokens with flying, where X is your life total.
cards.flavor:
"When you hear thunder on a cloudless day, take cover and brace for the coming of the storm herd."
-Skotov, Tin Street basket vendor

cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
cards.flavor: "The arc of my blade has carved a path of light for the peace that will follow."

cards.name: True Conviction
cards.text: Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.
cards.flavor: "Heroism is more than a single act; it is hundreds of small decisions, made every day, in pursuit of a heroic cause."

cards.name: Valor in Akros
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: There's no stronger armor than the bravery of those beside you.

cards.name: Vow of Duty
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
cards.flavor:
"I prefer loyalty to be a matter of respect, not of magic. But one does what one must."
-Kaalia of the Vast

cards.name: White Sun's Zenith
cards.text: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
cards.flavor: After the Battle of Liet Field, the white sun crested above Taj-Nar, bringing hope to all who survived the carnage.

cards.name: Aetherize
cards.text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.
cards.flavor: "You can come back once you've learned some manners-and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

cards.name: Angler Turtle
cards.text:
Hexproof
Creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.
cards.flavor: It is ancient, immense, and irresistible.

cards.name: Bident of Thassa
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
{1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.
cards.flavor: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.text: Counter target spell.

cards.name: Deep Analysis
cards.text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback-{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: "The specimen seems to be broken."

cards.name: Diluvian Primordial
cards.text:
Flying
When Diluvian Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may cast up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

cards.name: Distant Melody
cards.text: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.
cards.flavor: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts-on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

cards.name: Eternal Skylord
cards.text:
When Eternal Skylord enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have flying.

cards.name: Ever-Watching Threshold
cards.text: Whenever an opponent attacks, if they attacked you and/or a planeswalker you control, draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"You think they know we're here?"
-Orlo, goblin raider

cards.name: Faerie Formation
cards.text:
Flying
{3}{U}: Create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: The throng flitted from castle to castle, leaving a trail of star-crossed love, damaging rumors, and missing heirlooms in their wake.

cards.name: Favorable Winds
cards.text: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.
cards.flavor:
"Like ribbons of wind and wisdom the coatls fly, twisting mystery into truth, shaping the clouds to suit their inscrutable will."
-Huatli

cards.name: Geralf's Mindcrusher
cards.text:
When Geralf's Mindcrusher enters the battlefield, target player mills five cards.
Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Gravitational Shift
cards.text:
Creatures with flying get +2/+0.
Creatures without flying get -2/-0.
cards.flavor: As they awakened, the Eldrazi reasserted their mastery over all of Zendikar's natural forces.

cards.name: Inspired Sphinx
cards.text:
Flying
When Inspired Sphinx enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to the number of opponents you have.
{3}{U}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

cards.name: Laboratory Drudge
cards.text: At the beginning of each end step, draw a card if you've cast a spell from a graveyard or activated an ability of a card in a graveyard this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Many hands make light work."
-Ludevic, necro-alchemist

cards.name: Lazotep Plating
cards.text:
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
You and permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.name: Negate
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell.
cards.flavor: "As one, nature lifts its voice to tell you this: 'No.'"

cards.name: Sharding Sphinx
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever an artifact creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may create a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: Whether mechanical or biological, life finds a way to propagate itself.

cards.name: Sinister Sabotage
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
cards.flavor:
"We have intel that some guilds have fallen under an invader's influence. Until we're sure, no venture succeeds."
-Lazav

cards.name: Sphinx of Enlightenment
cards.text:
Flying
When Sphinx of Enlightenment enters the battlefield, target opponent draws a card and you draw three cards.
cards.flavor: "I would be a fool if I taught you everything I know."

cards.name: Tide Skimmer
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you attack with two or more creatures with flying, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Fishing boats often follow hunting drakes to find the largest schools of fish.

cards.name: Warden of Evos Isle
cards.text:
Flying
Creature spells with flying you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: On Evos Isle, the swift and formidable aven enforce the will of the ruling sphinxes.

cards.name: Windreader Sphinx
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature with flying attacks, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Your mind is too filled with foolish concerns to hear the subtle whispers that the breeze brings."

cards.name: Winged Words
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a creature with flying.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor: Magic written across the sky falls like rain on thirsty ground, bringing forth wisdom in its season.

cards.name: Ambition's Cost
cards.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
cards.flavor:
"Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier."
-Ob Nixilis

cards.name: Archfiend of Depravity
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player chooses up to two creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest.
cards.flavor: "Why would I kill you all? Who then would be left to worship me?"

cards.name: Army of the Damned
cards.text:
Create thirteen tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
Flashback {7}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: Sometimes death comes knocking. Sometimes it tears down the walls.

cards.name: Bloodgift Demon
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, target player draws a card and loses 1 life.
cards.flavor: He relishes the devotion of his Skirsdag puppets and their belief that it will earn them immortality.

cards.name: Cemetery Reaper
cards.text:
Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.
{2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
cards.flavor: Every grave cradles a recruit.

cards.name: Champion of the Perished
cards.text: Whenever another Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of the Perished.
cards.flavor: He rose from the graf for every cobbler, tanner, and fool who'd been slaughtered in the parish-and they rose and shambled after him.

cards.name: Crippling Fear
cards.text: Choose a creature type. Creatures that aren't of the chosen type get -3/-3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Panic spread like wildfire as the demons of Immersturm poured into Bretagard, slaughtering as they came.

cards.name: Cruel Revival
cards.text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: On Innistrad, Liliana embraced necromancy, honing her powers by practicing on scores of undead-and sometimes the living.

cards.name: Curse of Disturbance
cards.text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.
cards.flavor: Sounds of life beckon many a restless soul.

cards.name: Deadly Tempest
cards.text: Destroy all creatures. Each player loses life equal to the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way.
cards.flavor: When the winds blow out of the abyss, death is the only harvest.

cards.name: Dredge the Mire
cards.text: Each opponent chooses a creature card in their graveyard. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor: Fortunately, the reanimation spell just missed the long-dead colony of dung scorpions.

cards.name: Feed the Swarm
cards.text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.
cards.flavor:
"On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise."
-Skyclave inscription

cards.name: Fleshbag Marauder
cards.text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

cards.name: Gravespawn Sovereign
cards.text: Tap five untapped Zombies you control: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor: The warlocks never expected their creations to create servants of their own.

cards.name: Gray Merchant of Asphodel
cards.text: When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

cards.name: Indulgent Tormentor
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.
cards.flavor: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.

cards.name: Josu Vess, Lich Knight
cards.text:
Kicker {5}{B} (You may pay an additional {5}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Menace
When Josu Vess, Lich Knight enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create eight 2/2 black Zombie Knight creature tokens with menace.

cards.name: Lazotep Reaver
cards.text: When Lazotep Reaver enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
cards.flavor: Despite their many forms, the Eternals worked in chilling harmony, unburdened by instinct or emotion.

cards.name: Liliana, Untouched by Death
cards.text:
[+1]: Mill three cards. If at least one Zombie card is milled this way, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
[−2]: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
[−3]: You may cast Zombie spells from your graveyard this turn.

cards.name: Liliana's Devotee
cards.text:
Zombies you control get +1/+0.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
cards.flavor: Liliana inspires horror in many and fanatical admiration in a few.

cards.name: Liliana's Mastery
cards.text:
Zombies you control get +1/+1.
When Liliana's Mastery enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
cards.flavor: "There are so many of them. It seems they've just been waiting for someone to serve."

cards.name: Liliana's Standard Bearer
cards.text:
Flash
When Liliana's Standard Bearer enters the battlefield, draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures that died under your control this turn.
cards.flavor: The purple banner of the House of Vess is a symbol of death wherever it's flown.

cards.name: Lord of the Accursed
cards.text:
Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.
{1}{B}, {T}: All Zombies gain menace until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The Curse of Wandering leaves only hatred.

cards.name: Lotleth Giant
cards.text: Undergrowth - When Lotleth Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target opponent for each creature card in your graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"I prefer the big and looming to the small and skittering."
-Cevraya, Golgari shaman

cards.name: Loyal Subordinate
cards.text:
Menace
Lieutenant - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, each opponent loses 3 life.
cards.flavor: Zombies work best when they're fed appropriately, so it's prudent to let them eat on the job.

cards.name: Midnight Reaper
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Midnight Reaper deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.
cards.flavor: No one welcomes his visit, yet all must grant him tribute.

cards.name: Mire Triton
cards.text:
Deathtouch
When Mire Triton enters the battlefield, mill two cards and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: Caught between life and death, between land and sea, between thought and oblivion.

cards.name: Murder
cards.text: Destroy target creature.
cards.flavor: Ob Nixilis decided the fastest way to seize control of New Capenna would be to usurp the networks of power already hidden there. Xander's Maestros were the first to fall.

cards.name: Necromantic Selection
cards.text: Destroy all creatures, then return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control. It's a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Exile Necromantic Selection.
cards.flavor: It shambled from the cloud of ash and bone dust, undeterred by its own extinction.

cards.name: Necrotic Hex
cards.text: Each player sacrifices six creatures. You create six tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
cards.flavor:
"You foolish knights pound your breastplates and vow to fight until your last breath. As if that's when it ends."
-Tormod, the Desecrator

cards.name: Ob Nixilis Reignited
cards.text:
[+1]: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
[−3]: Destroy target creature.
[−8]: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a player draws a card, you lose 2 life."

cards.name: Open the Graves
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
cards.flavor: It was a night like any other. It would soon become a night no one would ever forget.

cards.name: Overseer of the Damned
cards.text:
Flying
When Overseer of the Damned enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature.
Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.name: Profane Command
cards.text:
Choose two -
• Target player loses X life.
• Return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
• Up to X target creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

cards.name: Rakshasa Debaser
cards.text:
Whenever Rakshasa Debaser attacks, put target creature card from defending player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
Encore {6}{B}{B} ({6}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Read the Bones
cards.text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.
cards.flavor: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

cards.name: Reign of the Pit
cards.text: Each player sacrifices a creature. Create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying, where X is the total power of the creatures sacrificed this way.

cards.name: Sangromancer
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may gain 3 life.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may gain 3 life.

cards.name: Scourge of Nel Toth
cards.text:
Flying
You may cast Scourge of Nel Toth from your graveyard by paying {B}{B} and sacrificing two creatures rather than paying its mana cost.
cards.flavor:
"May all the cairns of Jund be toppled."
-Meren of Clan Nel Toth

cards.name: Scythe Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Scythe Specter deals combat damage to a player, each opponent discards a card. Each player who discarded a card with the highest mana value among cards discarded this way loses life equal to that mana value.

cards.name: Sepulchral Primordial
cards.text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
When Sepulchral Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Sign in Blood
cards.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
cards.flavor: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

cards.name: Soul Shatter
cards.text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker with the highest mana value among creatures and planeswalkers they control.
cards.flavor: The Kargan tribes share legends of the victory their ancestors won over the Akoum Skyclave, and its horrendous cost.

cards.name: Spark Reaper
cards.text: {3}, Sacrifice a creature or planeswalker: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"I know they're unstoppable fighters created to harvest souls-it's just they're so rude about it."
-Kaya

cards.name: Syphon Flesh
cards.text: Each other player sacrifices a creature. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.
cards.flavor: Necromancers deal in commodities far more precious than gold and grain.

cards.name: Syphon Mind
cards.text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
cards.flavor: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

cards.name: Titan Hunter
cards.text:
At the beginning of each player's end step, if no creatures died this turn, Titan Hunter deals 4 damage to that player.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 4 life.
